:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X6S AC3000 Tri-Band WiFi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX8000.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX8000}} DFS support was added in an FCC Class II Permissive Change Request on 12/13/2017. :A firmware update is probably needed for early devices. Qualcomm IPQ4019 & QCA9984 is just a guess based on the specs, for now. :Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.com {{FCC ST|02/18/2018|indexme.}} ===See also=== *[[Netgear EX3110]] *[[Netgear EX6110]] *[[Netgear EX7500]] *[[Netgear EX8000]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices#AC3000]]
